name: Zero Grace Megadrive (LD48 Edition)
description:
You are Zero, defender of the DRIVE SPACE.

Use your AX monster truck to defeat invading worms by crushing them out of existence.

The drive space is counting on you. GOOD LUCK! ♥

Use the arrow keys and Z key to control the AX truck.

This game was made in PICO-8 for Ludum Dare 42.  You can check out the dev log here and the game's rating page here.
